result.markdown:
---
title: "Using Data From `rnaturalearth`"
---


# Call Libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"}
library(rnaturalearth) # natural earth data

library(ggplot2) # beautiful maps

library(dplyr) # data wrangling

library(sf) # simple (spatial) features
```
:::


# Get `ne_countries` As `sf`


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"}
ne_countries <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", 
                             returnclass = "sf") 
```
:::


# Map


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="true" code-summary="Show the code"}
ggplot(ne_countries) + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = income_grp)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(name = "Income Group", 
                       option = "viridis") +
  labs(title = "Countries of the World") +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](rnaturalearth_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
